title: Cosmic Queries Science in Movies and TV
description: Stay Tuned for… Science! Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Eugene Mirman answer more of your questions about science in Star Trek, Star Wars, Sliders, Superman, Contact, Mary Poppins and more.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
